mapper.update:
update toa_network_bandwidth set
company_id=#{companyId},
company_name=#{companyName},
gbps=#{gbps},
line=#{line},
wanglin=#{wanglin},
yzl=#{yzl},
langfang=#{langfang},
lugu=#{lugu},
dongsi=#{dongsi},
huasi=#{huasi},
shandong=#{shandong},
yidong=#{yidong},
tietong=#{tietong},
jiaoyu=#{jiaoyu},
keji=#{keji},
cnisp=#{cnisp},
guoji=#{guoji},
transfer=#{transfer},
remark=#{remark},
DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT=#{createUserDept},
CREATE_DATE=#{createDate},
MODIFY_USER=#{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1=#{extStr1},
EXT_STR2=#{extStr2},
EXT_STR3=#{extStr3},
EXT_STR4=#{extStr4},
EXT_STR5=#{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1=#{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2=#{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1=#{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2=#{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3=#{extNum3},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
